title: Tennis Players Need More Rest
summary: Tennis players like Iga Swiatek and Daria Kasatkina say the tennis season is too long and tiring. They feel mentally and physically exhausted because they play too many matches. The season lasts almost all year, with only a few weeks off. Doctors and player groups want to protect players by making the sport more sustainable. They suggest changes like shorter seasons or better schedules. This is important because players need time to rest and stay healthy to play their best.

background_read: Tennis is a sport where players hit a ball over a net. Professional tennis players travel around the world to play in tournaments. The season includes many matches, which can make players very tired. Rest is important for athletes to stay healthy and perform well. Some players and doctors are asking for changes to make tennis easier on the players.
